channel.title: [508] Help
channel.description:
Ok its not often I start NEW topics here but I have a serious problem.
BTW: This is my source, DavidScape 508 I was adding new features to my server, and all of a sudden I restarted it after compiling and there was a wierd glitch. When you login, it stays at "loading...please wait" forever and never logs you in. I always keep backups every day and loaded mine from a week ago (which I was 100% sure worked) and am getting the same problem. Any ideas?
Its really wierd and its never happened before.
PS: I bought a domain name and its not working anymore either... could they be linked...?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 07 October 2009, 18:47:49[/size][hr]EDIT: It now allows other people to login, but when they tele to home they get an error in client:
java heap space

item.title: [508] Help

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

  1. Reported!
  2. I know what the stupid error means, Im wondering whats causing it!

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Help
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Actually ! i Got that Error! Your Java application has a memory leak or Your Java application really needs a lot of memory.
